content: I am a Postdoctoral Fellow at Dr. QIAN Pei-Yuan’s lab. I am keen on conducting interdisciplinary sciences interlinked by microbial ecology, geosciences, chemistry, and computational sciences to solve pratical and cutting-edge problems regarding environment and energy.
summary: I am a Postdoctoral Fellow at Dr. QIAN Pei-Yuan’s lab. I am keen on conducting interdisciplinary sciences interlinked by microbial ecology, geosciences, chemistry, and computational sciences to solve pratical and cutting-edge problems regarding environment and energy.
